name: 100daysofcode-day15-coffeemachine
description: 1. Prompt the user by asking "What would you like? (espresso/latte/cappuccino): " * check the user's input to decide what to do next. * the prompt should show every time action has completed. e.g. once the drink is dispensed. The prompt should show again to serve the next customer. * espresso recipe: 50ml water, 18g Coffee * Latte recipe: 200ml water, 24g Coffee, 150ml Milk * Cappuccino Recipe: 250ml Water, 24g Coffee, 100ml Milk
